Eric Schmidt said Google had considered stopping indexing confidential cables released by WikiLeaks, but had decided to carry on. Some other U.S. organisations have bowed to government pressure to stop cooperating with the controversial site. Has Google looked at the appropriateness of indexing WikiLeaks? The answer is yes, and we decided to continue, he said. "Because it's legal."
